Pre-Game Insights: Shakib Al Hasan is expected to be fit to play against India.
Indian batters have conceded 42 wickets to left-arm spinners in ODIs since 2022.
Shakib Al Hasan has 10 wickets in four games at an average of 18 and strike rate of 24 against India since 2022.
Bangladesh have won three of their last four ODIs against India.
The pitch at Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium has traditionally been a batter's paradise.
Mohammed Siraj has the best PowerPlay record in 2023 and will look to add to that against Litton Das.
Shakib Al Hasan has dismissed Virat Kohli five times in 148 balls bowled at him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Only 6 wickets have fallen to spin in the last three matches at Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium.
Rohit Sharma averages 69.66 against Bangladesh in ODIs as captain.
Shakib Al Hasan has three 50+ scores in four World Cup games against India.
